import { forecastType } from '../types' type Props = { data: forecastType } const Degree = ({temp} : { temp: number }): JSX.Element => ( {temp}o ) function Forecast({ data }: Props): JSX.Element { const today = data.list[0] return (

{data.name} {data.country}

{today.weather[0].main}

{today.weather[0].description}

) } export default Forecast
